error.message: Fetching class constant FORM_ALTER of deprecated class Drupal\hook_event_dispatcher\HookEventDispatcherEvents. Deprecated in favour of the HookEventDispatcherInterface.

Parameter $tempStoreFactory of method Drupal\term_split\Form\SplitTerm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Class Drupal\Console\Command\Shared\TranslationTrait not found and could not be autoloaded.

Parameter $tempStoreFactory of method Drupal\term_split\Form\SplitTermConfirm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Tests\taxonomy\Functional\TaxonomyTestTrait in class Drupal\Tests\term_split\Kernel\TermSplitTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\taxonomy\Traits\TaxonomyTestTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\field\Tests\EntityReference\EntityReferenceTestTrait in class Drupal\Tests\term_split\Kernel\TermSplitTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.2 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Tests\field\Traits\EntityReferenceTestTrait instead.

Call to deprecated method getMock() of class Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\PhpunitCompatibilityTrait::createMock() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to term_split.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
